name: Volkan Rivera
body:
I'm a dynamic and diligent professional with many achievements in the Systems Administration area. During my 19 years of professional practice, I have proven my value as a Sysadmin through the implementation of advanced systems architecture projects, combining my technical knowledge with the ability to coordinate with the development team either in-house or abroad. I'm proactive and results-oriented. One of my strengths is solving problems in a effective manner using all the available resources in order to keep the cost under control and always meet the deadlines.

If you want to know more about me, you can take a look at my personal blogs:

* [English Blog](https://volkanrivera.com/eng/)
* [Spanish Blog](https://volkanrivera.com/esp/)

You can also follow me on:

* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/volkan68)
* [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/volkan68)
* [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/volkan68)
* [Google+](https://plus.google.com/+VolkanRivera)
